lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah we do!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you recognize from those voices, we have returning finally, after the first foray into parenthood, Travis and Laura! Welcome back!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You guys are a sight for sore eyes! Hi, Matt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We have missed you so much.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am so happy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How's the kid?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, he's great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, no. He's just a love and (snoring).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's here in the studio right now, so you might hear crying. If I get up from the table, it's because I'm going to go feed him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Aw. That's true.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He dictates all.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We are at his whim.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back.

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA
lines.text: Thank you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're happy to have you. We missed you at the live show.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We were with you there in spirit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, we felt it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Loved the birthday song, it was such great energy. You guys did so good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The audience was fantastic.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You guys looked wonderful. You especially, Samuel.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tonight, we have two fantastic sponsors. Our first, our wonderful returning sponsor for campaign two, our friends and D&D Beyond. Sam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Your sponsorship dollars will help our cast pay for the therapy they need after seeing my junk so close and personal. It's been a while since Travis and Laura were here, and this is their first show at the new studio. So D&D Beyond wanted me to bring them up to speed, to catch them up with things, with all things CR. Here is your update, you might want to take notes: Laura, the new wifi password is "DallasSux" with an "x." Travis, we rented out your parking spot to Brian Foster. The cardboard box he lives in will be parked there until September 15th.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought he was in the cage!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Wayfarer's Guide to Eberron, The Guildmaster's Guide to Ravnica are both available on D&D Beyond.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh good! I'm writing this down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Travis, while you were gone, we discovered Fjord's middle name is Bronco, so that's canon now. Laura, while you were gone, your dice were all loaned to Wil Wheaton for a little while.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The break room is open to all, but from 9:00 to 11:00 in the morning, Max uses it to poop. We have a code system for reserving the makeup room, so no one walks in. If you're breastfeeding, hang a sock on the door. If you're waxing Sam Riegel's chest hair, you hang a bandana on the door, and if you're having sex, leave the door open because that's kinky. Travis, we reinforced your chair to accommodate your baby weight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's real! Guys can get it, too!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Taliesin's new character is a cleric, so you don't have to heal anyone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck yes!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Liam shaved. It's Ashley's birthday. Marisha no longer thinks sleeves are bullshit, now she thinks they're assholes. All firblogs--bolgs know each other. If you go number one, please use the bathroom marked "Peeastock." If you go number two, use the one marked "Hupperdook." And there are flies motherfucking everywhere in the studio. And that's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Sam. Thank you, D&D Beyond.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To D&D Beyond, for sponsoring that inane list.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We appreciate that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I had a fur blog in the early 2000s.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Updated it every day, didn't you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Our second sponsor tonight, our fantastic friends at Dwarven Forge. You may have seen some of their products used pretty consistently on this show since I've had access to them. I've hungered after their work since I was a mid-20s-er, whatever you'd call that. Yeah. Thanks to their Kickstarters and their update from dwarvenite to resin, I was able to find them more affordable, and I love using it. They're big time Critters as well. They've been invested in the show, and they're also general leaders in hand sculpted and painted terrain sets. I love them, and they launched another Kickstarter recently for their Caverns Deep! set, which is awesome. It offers 15 different distinct encounter areas, like, as it says here, the Webbed Lair, the Mushroom Grotto, and a brand new forest terrain system called the Dreadhollow Forest, which me and Liam got unveil at Gen Con in a live game, that looks so fucking cool!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know! I backed that shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So did I. We're there, you should back it too! They also put out a video, I think yesterday, the day before, that unveils one of their passages, I think it's the prison passage, where you get to watch me, as a little mini, get imprisoned, brutalized, and then murdered! It's fun!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I didn't realize when we were trying to save your voice box in the game at Gen Con, that that was part of a running inside joke.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They asked if I'd help out with that, and I'm like, fuck yeah. You can become a backer now, if you're interested, at critrole.com/dwarvenforge for all the information about the current Kickstarter. It ends August 14th, so it's ending really soon. If you want to get in there, with all the amazing stretch goals, go check it out, and be the first to check out the exclusive Kickstarter at the price point that only the Kickstarter enables. Honey Heist 2: Electric Beargaloo--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Also, if you haven't seen yet, my fireside chat that we had on Tuesday, it's available on YouTube.com/criticalrole, where I drink a lot of really nice ports and talk questions and fun stuff. So it was a good hangout time. Hope to do those more in the future as well. I actually really enjoyed just sitting there and getting mildly tipsy with the Internet. It's fun. What the hell was that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was the magnets.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Quit putting your sex toys on the desk, man. Keep them underneath.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did my hit points already get updated on my thingie?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's the DM at work.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's what happens when people aren't updating it fast enough and we need to update the sheets here, so I do it for you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry, Matthew.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just blame the baby.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can we get a show of hands for everyone who got max HP this level-up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's fucking bullshit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fuck you, and you, and fuck you, and especially fuck you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I got three last time, though.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we got new baby magic, man. I'll take it where I can get it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She did roll pretty poorly last time. Ashley got an 11. Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yasha!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so whenever we get her back, she's going to be a little beefier. Last but not least, we have a bunch of new items in the shop. We have our retro tees back, we have the new Critter cap is in stock.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, wait! That's my job!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I thought you said you didn't have anything to update.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I said I didn't have anything to hold up!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then here, go for it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have new shirts! We have new hats!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's been gone so long, don't take her job!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know which camera to look at because it's a little different than before.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That one right there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This one?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's a bumper sticker that says, "The Traveler is My Co-Pilot."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Beautiful. Keep going, yeah. Do it for your son.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's-- we have The Mighty Nein shirt. I don't know what else is there anymore.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jeez, get off my back, Mom!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The shirt, yeah, good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The bumper sticker.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have the bumper sticker, we have the hats, we have the t-shirts, and we have a pin, which is going to come back in the store. It's not in the store just at this moment, but it will be back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It will be back, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And there's other things coming in the store soon, too.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice job, babe. A-one. Top shelf.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As a reminder, we have our Wyrmwood giveaways at the break. We'll have information on that when we get to it, but you'll have to move over to the twitch.tv/criticalrole chat to jump into it and be a part of it. But we'll talk of that when we get to it. With that, our announcements for the evening are done.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have a question.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, that's it. I'm already a dad. That's all I had to say!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And welcome back, everybody. That was a unique rush. Last we left off-- we're going to do a little bit of time bending here, so we can make sure we get everything we want to. Last we left off, The Mighty Nein, upon heading towards the second leg of their journey, completing a task for The Gentleman, of who they had left Zadash to earn money and praise with, found themselves in the outskirts of Hupperdook, where three members of their team were captured in the middle of the night by a group of traveling slavers.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Which members?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pay attention!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh no, Jester has amnesia, you guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then suddenly, there's the sound of battle, weapons scraping on stone and metal and flesh, screams, familiar voices, flashes of light, the air rushing warm and cold with the nearby blasting of arcane energies, divine forces and powers brought in to sustain and snuff life, and then silence. You hear the voices come close, and as you barely manage to move over and glance over your shoulder, you watch as the bars swing open to the chamber where you're held, and the tiny form of Nott the Brave rushes over and embraces you, saying:

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Case closed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (muffled speech)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yes, okay! I'll take whatever is on her mouth off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You pull off what is essentially a thick leather gag that has been keeping her from speaking.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Oh!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hello.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How did you guys find us?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, we followed the clues, we traced the evidence, we thought about it logically, and also this girl who was walking down the street told us where to go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't even get to tell anyone! I tried to. I tried to cast Sending, but my hands are bound.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, let me untie you. I'll cut out-- cut off her hands.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're bound by chained manacles, but we'll say, given the fact that there is no immediate pressure of time, you take your time with the bindings, using your lock picks, and manage to free her of the manacles.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you. Fjord is also tied up, though, really bad.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How are you doing? Oh, sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, my muscles would be really sore. This is really hard for me. Somebody else should help him out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you sure he's not just--?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seriously, though, this is really painful, somebody should help him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, we'll help him out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you know how bad it is to have your hands tied behind your back for several days?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't, no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's not fun.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no! Fjord, are you all right? Are you injured? Did they cut off your thumbs?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, we got our thumbs. Where is-- Where is Yasha?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I don't know. Do you guys see Yasha?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They took her out of here. They were--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They knocked her unconscious.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey! Beau, do you see Yasha out there?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I look in the other chamber. Is she in there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys had noticed, at this point you've glanced over in the other chamber and you do see, faced away and lying within the other chamber, is Yasha. You manage to eventually get it open, and inside, she is lying there, motionless.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I check her to see if she's still breathing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mm-hmm. It's really relatively easy to check: she's breathing. She looks pretty brutalized. There are gashes and tear marks in the flesh where hooks were pulled through, there are streaks of dried blood on her. But she's not unconscious within an inch of her life. She's a hardy woman, and she's endured a lot and then some, and she lies here unconscious before you, still bound in manacles.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Seeing Beau go in ahead of me, still sitting on the table, I mutter a word and cast Knock and the manacles fall away.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Deuces.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hmm?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have any healing left?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not a drop.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have-- I have healing, though. Don't worry, I have healing. Who are you? I have healing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you okay?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. I mean, I can heal. I haven't been using any spells-- I can't use anything when your hands are tied.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just give Jester a big hug.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you, Beau. Thank you guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, let's-- let's move.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I go cast Cure Wounds on Yasha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The wounds seal up and she notably becomes healthier. Some scars still remain, but she's further from the brink. But still unconscious.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is the room clear? Did you take care of all of them?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. Yes, I think so. We haven't scouted around every--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There were so many.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We had some help.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You did?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shakäste's here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I saw Shakäste!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shakäste?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we saw him in one of the-- I just couldn't tell you! I saw him in one of the other cages.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I didn't see him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There was also a really nice firbolg named Nila. Her son and her mate got scooped up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that like Pumat Sol?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. It's like him, too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is Caduceus, he also came with us to help out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Caduceus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hello.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We met him this morning.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We've had an interesting 24 hours.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm here to help. I made a deal with this one. It's okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like your hair.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you. I like your hair, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Caduceus, I'm Fjord. Appreciate your help.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You want to get up out of this thing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where's Molly?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, your friend.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is he waiting upstairs?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He didn't make it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To this dungeon? Because he's waiting upstairs?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He didn't survive the trip. I'm really sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was that when we heard you guys?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The caravan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We were in the caravan, we heard you guys fighting.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We heard people shouting, I heard you call for Molly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We couldn't see you. We could barely see anything. We were stuck, they had us gagged and bound. I swore I heard a few voices, but we were moving before we knew it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We tried shouting. There's just no way you could hear us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, we are sorry. We tried our best, but it wasn't good enough.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He tried his best. He got right up in Lorenzo's face, and he just wasn't strong enough.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We got cocky and underestimated our enemies.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's not your fault.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where did you leave him?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right? No, that's not right. That's the old campaign.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You buried him along the Glory Run Road.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a fitting name. We can take you there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's on the way back to Zadash. We've got to talk to the Gentleman, anyway.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you kill everyone here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lorenzo?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about that short guy that was really mean?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Protto?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck him. Protto.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We should be sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They were a nasty bunch. Lorenzo was not what he seemed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Make sure there is nobody left. We agreed to clear this house of everything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck! I'm sorry. We should have seen them coming, heard them. We just weren't expecting it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's no one's fault.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It doesn't feel that way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, it doesn't. I was lying.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha. Yasha doesn't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She won't know for a while. It always takes them a while to wake up. That elven woman, she would cast something, she would do something to the manacles.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To make them impossible to--?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They'd beat the fucking hell out of us, and then if there was anything left, one touch, and that was it. Darkness.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We overheard them saying that they were trying to break people mentally. Do you know what they were trying to use you guys for?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They were going to sell us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To who?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoever would buy us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Whoever was paying. I think they were trying to work on our minds first. Sounds like Yasha got the physical part next. It was a long night. I preferred it to the beating, though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We saw blood when we woke up. Was that yours or theirs?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Probably ours.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck, you guys. I am so sorry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm sorry. I don't even know what to say.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, piece of shit is dead, all his fucking cronies are dead.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And we learn for the future: this won't happen again. You understand me?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, this is pretty good from a certain perspective. I mean, if you think about it. Bad things happen to people every day, and then you have a bunch of people who care about you so much that they come and save you, fix it, defeat a great evil. I mean, nothing this good ever happens. This is great. I'm going to go check upstairs. I think you guys have a lot to talk about. I'm going to head upstairs and start searching.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You turn around and there's Keg awkwardly standing in the back of the chamber, hearing all this. You can see the guilt in her eyes, and she goes, "I'm going to go join Caduceus." Pulls out a cigarette and lights it as she follows him up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Caduceus is an interesting one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I liked his hair.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's got great hair.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wish I had hair like that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, me too.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pretty positive.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Whatever he says.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You guys did come to save us, though. Thank you, really.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Molly laid down his life for you guys. He was the best of us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We had no choice, I mean--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You did! You did have a choice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you did. You could have let us go. I wouldn't be telling you the truth if I didn't say I didn't consider it for a couple days.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I would have laid down my life for you guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I would have tried to heal you back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks, Jester. Here. I pull out from the back of my--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: From your butt? What did you pull out of your butt?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's Molly's sword.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Beau got a big ol' butt.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think it would suit both of you, but I feel like one of you should have it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, you roomed with him the most.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I like really cool things, so, I mean, I will take it if, you know. I was also tiefling, he's a tiefling, we were both really cool.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What about his jacket?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We left it to mark his grave. It's probably stolen, but the thought was nice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: People need killing if that happened, so, you know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If I ever see anyone wearing Molly's coat--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're going to fucking slit their throats.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Unless it's him. He could come back from the dead or something. He's done it before.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's done it before? Oh, right. Lucien?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lucius.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Lucien.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lucius. Lu-chel.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nonagon?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Kind of a moot point at this moment.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're right. I would be honored to have this sword. Caleb. Thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: TRAVIS. Sure it was. Nott. Thanks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's an honor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Beau?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hmm?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you, Jester.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe we can hold on to some of those gags.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me and Fjord spent a lot of time together in this cell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. None of that happened. No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lots of eye contact happening. Just between me and you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've heard stories about people in captivity sort of resorting to primal instincts.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. I noticed him rolling over towards me several times, if you know what I mean.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I do know what you mean.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He kept wiggling. You can't really move very much, you wiggle like a little--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Must have been cold at night. You had to snuggle for body heat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like shoulder to shoulder, like this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But really, we should get Yasha out of here, because she's still unconscious. This is fucked up. Stop joking, you guys, this is serious.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, oh, oh! Kiri's fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you-- wait.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kiri's okay, Kiri's fine. We found a new home.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know. I was there, I said goodbye to her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I understand how you would think, because I wasn't quite myself, but--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, also, there's this town where there's these gnomes and they dance all night!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, it's called Hupperdook. It's the funniest name.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I love that name.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Before that-- I'd forgotten how long you were gone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Too long.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Too long.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You've done a marvelous job, and we can't thank you enough. Let us help you with whatever--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Insight check. Has he been turned? Is he different, is he weird?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, shit!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whispers!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Laslo has jumped bodies.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who are you, really?! (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Good times, you guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's get out of here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, please, get us the fuck out of here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are there other prisoners in this area, too, or is it just us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys were the first ones that were-- you were the prime candidates to be broken.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We were extra special.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, guys? Fuck human traffickers, am I right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're terrible.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's go rob them blind.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, let's do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I bet they have so much stuff!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We rob them blind!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shouldn't we try and wake up Yasha?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have two healers here. Three.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, we healed her, she's still just--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's just out because of the effect of the--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will hang out with her while you guys go check the house. Please bring me any books.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We get everyone out of the basement and we lay Yasha down upstairs some place comfortable.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will sit with her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys bring her up and you look for other people who were in the cages, you notice that they're all missing. Shakäste has ushered them out of the complex to get them to safety as he said he would.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh Shakäste, yay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caduceus and Keg are up there sharing a conversation, feeling like the proverbial outsiders.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I didn't actually search the house, I just ended up in the kitchen. I'm starting to cook food. It was a nice kitchen when we ran through it. I'm trying to see if I can put together some sort of omelette or something.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I love that so much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I love it. Keg is going through the corpses of the different thugs and rolling them for change. She's got a cigarette hanging out of the mouth feeling through pockets. Who's helming the investigation of the stronghold?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll take one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will assist.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so go ahead and roll twice and roll with advantage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What was that thing where I could spend a ki point and do another roll on my insight check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well no, it gives you advantage to spend a ki point to do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, 16. Oh sorry. 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15, all right. Over the next hour or so, you guys begin to tear through. If someone wants to take note of this, these are the things that you find--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Short rest!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, this is me writing this stuff down now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's your job, isn't it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, somebody hijacked all my good pencils when I was gone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Here's a pencil.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're functional.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can sell them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the low end. Because you got higher than a 12, you do find-- the bottom floor is a number of the-- the second basement floor, you find a plethora of torture implements. Plenty of brands and small blades and hooks. You find flaying knives. It's a terrible array. If you were to choose to take any, you could write down torture implements. Should you be so inclined. You do find on the bodies of the--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shooting a Hostel sequel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. On the bodies of everyone who-- all the bodies that still remain here, as the body of Lorenzo is destroyed other than the glaive, you find 131 gold pieces across all those bodies.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That'll make up for what you stole from me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In the storage chests that are in various bunkers in the top floor, you also find a potion that looks like a weird, syrupy, quicksilver type of a liquid on the inside of this little glass vial and you find this receipt.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (singing) Gimme gimme gimme!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It'll be good for our taxes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Service and payments to the Iron Shepherds. House Jagentoths. Who's Jagentoths?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've heard that before.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, Keg has spoken. That's the opposing house to House Mardun.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, the house that sponsors The Iron Shepherds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: These are the receipts (gasp)-- these are the receipts of--!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of people!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah! Oh my god!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Travel for hire, bribery--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, this could take down the Jagentoths.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tools and materials, delivered goods polished.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Could take them down in a place that has law. But it may have some use, you don't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Blackmail!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did get the baseline 15 DC, though, in going through the upstairs chamber that you found to be Lorenzo's chamber. Through the bed, you find 15 gold pieces scattered in some of the shelves near the bed unit, beneath where there's the platter containing the remains of some young creature. Then beneath, tucked underneath the bed and up into the slats, you find a heavy leather bag of some kind. You pull it out, and what you find is--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nothing's trapped, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can check if you want to. Go ahead and make an investigation check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want me to check?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you with me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was assisting.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That rogue shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Investigation? 22.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're not even drunk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not trapped, just well hidden. You do find this thick leather satchel. As you pull it back, it's well made. It has some stains on it, it looks like. Some more of a crimson history, some that look like general dirt wear and tear.

lines.name: TRAVIS, MARISHA, MATT
lines.text: Crimson.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The stitching is really well done, and the front of it looks like a face, the way it's designed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does it have an open drawstring? Can I look inside?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look inside and it looks like an empty bag.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Blue ink (puffing).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe it's another haversack?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does it seem magical to you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let me reach in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. See how far you hand goes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I reach in and think of gold. See if I pull it out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No gold.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did it feel cold in there or anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The temperature felt consistent with the temperature of the room you're in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you reach the bottom?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I got an idea. I'll take one of these long swords and I'll put it in the bag.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Might just poke through the the thing. Why don't we do something that won't poke through?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Too late. It's happening.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (gasping)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Motherfucker!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What else could be in here?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh, that's right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to reach in and think of--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) Doughnuts. Think of something good to eat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Finger foods!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing comes out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Think of something magical. Think of poop.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to think of gems. Precious stones.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't get any stones, no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Think of jewelry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How do you know that was close?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like it was.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Think of the heads of his enemies.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't want to touch that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But what if they're in there? We don't want to be walking around with heads.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think of jewelry!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No jewelry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's looking at something. There's something in there!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's in it?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll take it to Caleb!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Here's the thing. I do know that with my haversack-- where is it, by the way? Who has my haversack?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think Caleb has it, actually, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which is great too, when you see the dirty coat and the giant, bright, hot pink haversack over the shoulder. It's a pretty great visual.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was waiting for the right moment to give it back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you cut the haversack, all of its contents spill out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You could've ruined it! Oh, but wait--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: From the outside. If you cut it from the outside, if you pierce it, all of its stuff falls out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we repair after that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it's doneskies.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's see what Caleb can do with it first.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: True, yeah. Are there any books in his room specifically for Caleb?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking through, not much of a reader. Not a lot of readers in here. The few that had any sort of magical persuasion, none of it was knowledge-based. Most of it was instinct or natural innate ability.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Piece of shit ability, is that what you mean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Douchebag ability.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I go through and look around for any papers or documents that would point to anyone else that he was working for or selling to?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys did together. This is the next hour, hour and a half of you guys going through as much as you can, as quickly as you can, because you are still not supposed to be seen or found in connection with this. You all eventually gather everything and come back to Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You find him-- while they were gone, Caleb, holding the huge slash on his chest together, and the coat is ripped, laid down next to Yasha, looking at the ceiling. After a long moment of silence, said: Oh, that's quite a day, ja?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're injured? I didn't even know! Is everybody injured?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm sorry we weren't faster.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're a little banged up, but we're fine.

lines.name: LIAM, MARISHA
lines.text: We're fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) Why was he talking to Yasha?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Heal, Jester.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What time is it actually?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would gather at this time it's maybe close to three in the morning. Sunrise is not that far away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did we see Caduceus upstairs?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, Caduceus is in the kitchen cooking, and you begin to hear some pots rattle around, and you smell some nice scents of fried herbs and veggies and some other non-meat based food preparation.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Before we get back down to Caleb I say: do you need a hand?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh no, I'm fine. I've got this. This is no problem.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. Okay. I'll go back down--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you find anything that looks good to eat, actually, bring it back up. I'll cook it right up. That's no problem.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: From downstairs?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You could keep a lot of roots down there. It'd be very fresh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Roots.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Potatoes, turnips, carrots. Roots.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, roots. Sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You've had a carrot before, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, no I've had a carrot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ah yeah that's good. They're really good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, Matt? Question. Do I-- between me and Caleb-- who has keen memory-- would we remember how many prisoners were in the stronghold including these guys?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Including these guys?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb would know how many they've seen.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And escaped. How many did we let go including Shakäste?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nein?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that what "deliver goods polished" means? Nine delivered? Okay, just making sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. Polished...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have polished-- does that mean like--?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Erased.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Beaten in? Yeah, erased.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Broken.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's get the fuck out of here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't want to get a little healing first in case there are fucking hyenas outside or some shit?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's bears.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh that counts.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's bone bears.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bone bears?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Caleb is slashed across his chest.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's also a road so we'll be okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I hear this conversation?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, we're around.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'd recommend staying the night; you're all pretty banged up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I was going to say we do have cover here, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's even beds.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What if they have others working with them who come home?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is a good point.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Someone will keep watch.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That worked out really well for us last time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, let's take it easy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we all in the same room at this point?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point you guys have gathered together we'll say.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We handed you that haversack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have a-- Never mind, I'll tell you tomorrow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cure Wounds.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is-- Oh!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because I'm a healer. I'm a really good one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Amazing!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know. It's pretty impressive.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Healers are like cats. You have to have two so they can keep each other motivated. So funny.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One's just fat and never moves.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughing) Competition.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have been carrying this for you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My bag! Thank you, Caleb! Although, it looks really good with your coat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Looks better on you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We didn't find any books upstairs, sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I didn't think-- Thank you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We found a strange bag. Maybe, when you're feeling a little better, you can look at it and tell us its magicalness.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yep. Oh, now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no, whenever you like.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who has it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it match?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, book out and on the floor and start tracing the symbols on the floor and give me ten minutes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to lay down and take a short rest, as Beau's feeling rough.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's food.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tired. I'm going to eat some of Caduceus's food.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caduceus eventually comes and joins you guys, with platters of all sorts of well-cooked, well-spiced, organic vegetables, and whatever else you happen to have on you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's D&D: Everything's organic!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: True.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mushrooms, and beans.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Blood pudding.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mmm, coffee.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what are you casting, Caleb?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hmm?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you casting?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, Identify.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Identify, okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa, it's long!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's an epic poem right there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You guys know what this is!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it the thing? Is it The Bag?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is a bottomless bag.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bottomless bag?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Different from what we have?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, it's got a bottom.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It can hold a lot, though. It can hold a lot. More than--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can it hold more than mine?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, then it's expensive. Because mine was very pricey and it holds some stuff.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you knew how to bargain, maybe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who wants it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who wants it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa! What happened? I mean, I know what happened. Fuck.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How about I hold it for you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Tradition.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) Tradition! Wow!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can cook?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I definitely can cook. I mean, whether or not it's any good, I'm not sure. But if everybody's happy with it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are we doing? Are we staying here, or are we hitting the road?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just start scarfing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make sure you know everything it can do, so you guys don't--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry. I was napping for a moment, what?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Badass, what do you want to do? Are we staying here, or are we hitting the road?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, you're the leader, Caleb. You tell us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're the leader?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yes! He took a position of authority while you were gone, and he rose to the occasion.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's wonderful, Caleb. I'm very proud of you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ah, Mr. Caleb, you don't really look in the state to travel, really. I mean, just to point it out, you've taken a bit of a beating today.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I don't always look great, but point taken.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a bed upstairs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think we should stay here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can all sleep in the same bedroom and you can put your wire thingy in front of it, and then we'll know if anyone tries to break in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can drag mattresses down into the living room, light a fire.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Have a fort party?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fort party.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a good idea. I have a surprise for you all.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (shushing) (groaning) Oh, shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there light in where we are? Is there torchlight or anything in the lower space?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think you guys are probably not hanging down in the torture dungeon now, which has very low red light from occasional low-burning wall sconces. The main chambers are well-lit with torches in the hallway areas, and the interior chambers are a little low-lit. So there is light; there's just not a lot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I take the bag and hold it up under a light source and look in, see if there's stuff rumbling around and it just looks empty?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look inside, and it looks pretty empty.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I shake it, does it make any noise?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No noise.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll reach in and just grab the inside of it and turn it out, see if there's stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (clattering, clanging)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: From the bag?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From the bag.

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: How'd you do that? What is that? What's in there? What was it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He just flipped it inside out!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a piñata.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. I have deep arcane ability.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is it? What'd we get?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you pierce it? Is it ruined forever now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I just turned it inside out, and all this shit poured out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Magic.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to pick up a couple things.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yer a wizard, Harry!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (Harry Potter voice) I'm a what? (Hagrid voice) And a thumpin' good one, I'd wager.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The heavy noise that draws you guys over to this involves collecting 101 platinum pieces that were in the bag-- (yelling)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are dumbasses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Four additional sets of manacles.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Those things-- those fucking things!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why do these things follow us everywhere?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're evil! Those are really evil!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The big villain for this campaign will become Mister Manacle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did the lady ever say anything when she was casting, or was it just touching?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was just casting a spell, and she wasn't always touching it necessarily. She was just near it, and sometimes would touch it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (growling)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About two dozen teeth clatter to the ground, from varying backgrounds, and levels of decay. A meat hook: a handheld meat hook. Looks a bit rusted.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Gross.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a red gem: a well-carved red gem about that big, not quite a ruby, called a corundum gem. A sealed envelope-- a wax-sealed envelope, but as part of the seal there's a coin pressed into the seal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A special coin? What does the coin look like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's what it looks like.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, fuck! Physical props!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In fact, you recognize it immediately. This is called a galley.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is a galley.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A galley is specifically a gold piece that is produced along the Menagerie Coast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, it even smells good. It smells like home!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe we should open it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it trapped?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will look at the coin for traps!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb is doing the silver wire while that happens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It does not appear to be trapped.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You guys, should I open it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Looks like there's a handprint on the back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ew, is it blood? Does it look like blood, or-- it looks like somebody spilled their hand in tea or coffee.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a little more like the grease stain of somebody who was holding it, not necessarily any bloodstain. Like Lorenzo maybe had grasped it while a little greasy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I open it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes! It could be a wedding invitation!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I did it already. Ooh!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god, this is so awesome.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh goodness-- whoa, what is this thing? There's a drawing on it. It's a really good drawing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh. It is a very good drawing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That a peach?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a cantaloupe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's like a melon with a cut in it. Many thanks to you-- What is that name?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jonas?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ionos, I think is what it is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's an I.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "For dealing with the thieves who appropriated my possession. Reliability like this "will prove profitable for you and your house, should you continue to be. One half of our agreed "payment is enclosed--" (gasp) Is that what the hundred platinum was? One half of it? "With the "other being paid upon recovery of the cloven crystal--" I think that's what this thing is. "It is "imperative that you find this bauble and return it to me. It has great sentimental value to me and my "family. This rendering should suffice to guide the discerning eyes of your hunters."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I pull out the red gem and hold it next to the picture. Does it look like the same?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The red gem is just a square-shaped, hewed gem. That looks like a crystal sphere with a giant, hacked crack across the front of it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Time is of the essence, and should I not have it by the end of--"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's really familiar to you, though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Queen... pillar? Queen's--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Quen'pillar?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Quen'pillar? Is that a month? What is that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Quen'pillar is a month, yes. It's the next month.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we know that month.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Time is of the essence. Should I not have it by the end of Quen'pillar, I will be forced to end "our agreement and seek a business relationship elsewhere. I warn you: we are fiercely loyal to "those who appease us, and staunchly resentful to those who do not."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then he said, "Ah!" when he was writing it, for sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "When recovered, please deliver to--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "Marius LePual at the Wayfarer's Cove."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you? No-- "Tell him you have a gift--"

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: "for the Captain."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And it's signed--

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: Evantica!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Wayfarer's Cove you're also familiar with. It's one of the three main shipping yards of Nicodranas.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is-- you guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's more stuff. If they don't get it soon, someone will be pissed off. Marius LePen?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait... Somebody hired-- Oops! Do you think somebody hired Lorenzo to do this? Or do you think that Lorenzo stole this from somebody--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester, will you hold up that letter so that I can see the drawing, please?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you recognize it, Fjord?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Doesn't everybody?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It looks kind of like a cantaloupe with a hole in it--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yes! Yes, we saw one of these! It's in your belly!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that what's in your belly?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's pretty damn close.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ah!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It looks like an eye.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, wait, wait! We just need to return--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hold on, this letter was for you?! Are you Marius LePen?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you know Evantica?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I just sit down on the floor and lean back against the wall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you ever been to the Wayfarer's Cove?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. Well--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have. I've been there before.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's not true, I have.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But you're from the Menagerie Coast, that's when you guys met.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've been there--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but he wasn't in Nicodranas with me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've been to those harbors before. Many times.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait wait wait! If we bring you there, we'll get a hundred platinum, you think?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where did we find this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Excuse me just a moment, I'm sorry. Does anyone have a glass bead? Just a glass bead: cheap, doesn't matter.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I don't think so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Glass bead?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I have something on me? Would I have a glass bead?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have fifty rings; do you have a glass bead? Necklaces, anything? Do you wear a glass bead on you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I gave my beaded bracelet to Nott. Nott, you still have my beaded bracelet, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Was it beaded? The jade bracelet?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The jade beaded bracelet?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's jade, it's not glass.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you have a bead?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Would it work?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have shards of shiny pottery, silverware from the fish people. Human jerky, a dead rat--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Human jerky? Where the fuck have you guys been?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A vase, some old flowers--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Your rings, do any of them have just a glass-- are they costume jewelry?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He pries it-- He's not very good at it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aw, man. I really liked the look of that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You bring out what looks to be a really nice pearl.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, okay, good. Throws the ring away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I can mend it! Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As you were. Then he starts muttering again and walking around the circle that the silver wire makes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get the sense that it's not a real pearl. This is a pretty cheap piece of jewelry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, wait. Let the masters work here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, let's figure this out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where did we see that? Where was that? Was that in the tree? That was in the tree.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, that was in that thing--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Down underneath, in the well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Underneath the tree, with the fish people.

lines.name: MARISHA, LAURA
lines.text: With the fish people.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They were like, worshiping it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do they call those people?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're called merrow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Merrow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, so the merrow stole that from a water place, right? The Way--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You just spit on this letter. I saw it happen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm a goblin, I spit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you know, Fjord, that the thing inside of you is called the cloven crystal?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or the clover crystal?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I didn't.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cloven? cloven crystal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well now we know something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And the merrow stole it from someone here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, do I know Marius LePule?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Neither does the Captain.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is a mystery.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It is. We'll solve this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I see it for just a second? I'll give it right back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's evidence! Wear gloves.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Make sure you don't get your fingerprints all over it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would like Caleb and Beauregard, and Fjord, actually-- the three of you to roll intelligence checks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why not us? Why aren't we--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb is not paying attention to anything going on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true. So just Beauregard.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just straight intelligence?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh boy. Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bummer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would I roll an intelligence check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Damn it. Is this a real coin?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a real coin, yes. It is a gold coin; if you'd like to take it off of the envelope, you may add one gold to your--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it's so pretty on the envelope, though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Evantica?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Evan-tee-ca? Ev-ahn-tica?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It really does smell like home.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ionos.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Captain. The Captain was the person who stole it? No. What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, the Captain-- he has the letter, I can't tell you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "Tell him you have a gift for the Captain when you see Marius--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: LePual.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "LePual at the Wayfarer's Cove." (inhale) Well, I have the cloven crystal. I do not have access to it at the moment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I poke his belly. Do I feel a little hard spot on it? Do I feel it? I rub it. Do I feel a little circle on there? Little globe under the armor there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Please. Stop.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord is expecting.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe we should have Caleb check out some of these items. I mean, what if this meat hook, like, you know--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's muttering and walking in circles.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: -- is magic; you throw it and it comes back to you or some shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should just try throwing it and see if it comes back to you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Matt, what was the Cult of the Caustic Heart? I'm trying to remember.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which one?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cult of the Caustic Heart?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Cult of the Caustic Heart. That was, if I recall, with Calianna.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep, yeah. Yep, that's exactly what that was.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The two dozen teeth, are there any of the tusk variety?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking over them, it appears that one of them would be similar to a tusk, yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I take that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everybody hears some muttering behind them of words they don't understand, and then they hear Caleb say: Huaah! A large bubble goes (voom) in the entire entryway, and there is a giant half-dome of pale, orangish-brown energy; and then you just see Caleb's head go "Hey, look what I "made!" (whoosh)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we go into it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we going-- (gasps) Is it a dope pillow fort?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we see through it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the moment? Looking at the specifics of this...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (shouting) Caleb, can you hear through it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (shouting) Ja!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we come into it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Only you!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there a door?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I just hit the side of it? How do I get in?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, you walk in and as soon as you're in and look back where you came, you don't see what you walked through, you just see the room and everybody around it. (whispering) They can all come in, but be quiet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. This is so cool! Well, you need pillows in here, Caleb. This is really neat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to walk in. Did it work?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hello.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hi! Ooh!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does sound come out of it? Do I hear them talking?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Probably.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hi!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you okay?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've been working on this for weeks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is really cool!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like a solid dome of faintly orange-ish brown colored energy and you can pass through it. It feels like there's nothing there except for the temperature on the inside. It's nice and comfortable.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can anybody come through, or only your friends? Only people that you like.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can come in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That means you like me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to try and push my hand through.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It goes through.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I pull Fjord in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (yells) Cool.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So the idea behind this is that if we sleep in a field or something, nobody's going to come and take us off to be tortured in the night.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like that idea. A lot.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We can go through it, you can go through it, I can go through it-- well, I have to stay inside it, but (chair squeaks) excuse me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you just fart?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, now we're trapped in here with the fart! It's like a big Dutch oven!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh god it's magnified. It's unbelievable! Human jerky!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have bigger ideas for a big place, but I can't... But this I can do!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a starter house, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A yurt.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like it, it's cozy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I like it, too.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It feels like outside, but, you know. Also, if we're ever in a tight spot and we know something--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (devious chuckling)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: First game back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know if I'm looking at Laura or Jester-- if we're ever in a tight spot, I can also do this if we are in real danger. That's a little tricky because it takes some time to do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. It's brilliant. I love it! Caduceus, come check it out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How tall is he? Is his head touching the ceiling?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, how tall is Caduceus?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Tall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How tall?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: About seven feet tall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, he's a tall fellow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How tall is the roof in here?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like a hundred feet up, I think.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The dome is about a ten foot radius.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So ten feet at the top.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I couldn't make any furniture yet. But anyway, in a pinch, and tonight. And the alarm is up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can do both at the same time?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's been done, Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're incredible!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Beau goes out, grabs a bunch of pillows from the couches and starts throwing them in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A voice on the outside goes, "Uh, where'd everyone go?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who's that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's Keg, probably. Keg, we're in here!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, Keg.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Can she come in?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Short, reddish brown hair. Currently in the last elements of a hand rolled cigarette, in full armor, smattered with blood.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can't make a side bubble, so-- I don't mean to intrude, but what you said--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Stop talking to me, Caleb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hey, so I guess we saved you?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You helped?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (doubtful groans)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, she fought bravely.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Quite a bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Appreciate you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know what would have happened without you guys. Really.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sold and probably killed in a few months in a horrible--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know. I feel like I would be really nice to have around the house. People might have kept me around.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's not-- That doesn't make anything better.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But thank you, Keg. You were amazing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm just happy to make up for past mistakes."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I drag Yasha's body into the thing with us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll go gather up the money and the teeth and the meat hook and the red gem and all that shit in the bag. And then turn it back out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Teeth and coin and gem all come clattering into the middle of your circle.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I brought you stuff to identify.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a lot. I will spend the next hour or so before bed going through every single thing slowly and methodically with my spellbook.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The potion that you found earlier is magical.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And that gem that you had, Beauregard. The red gem.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The red gem is also magical.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The sets of manacles emit a faint magical aura.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All the things! Yes!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What did we get?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Leave me alone, I'm reading.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Meat hook?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Meat hook is not magical.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This has great power.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a meat hook.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's it do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You look really scary with it on you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whoa! It's probably been through people's skulls, actually.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, probably.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll take it. You said there was lots of shortbows and longbows? Arrows?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Six shortswords.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bolts?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are bolts. If you wanted to restock, there's probably close to 300 bolts.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll fill up. Also, I'll take some arrows as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Probably about a hundred arrows.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Anything I can throw?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say yeah. If you're looking around I say you find an errant dagger or two.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll take an errant dagger or two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two daggers.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Two daggers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not too difficult to locate in this space.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is this what Yasha had on her? Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Should we go to sleep?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll make sure Caleb's square.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, we're good. This potion will give you a silver tongue for an hour or so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like you'll be a really good talker?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, like this one over here. Or made this one inhuman. I'll come back to this. This is the manacles Yasha had on her when we found her. This is strange, you put them on a person and someone like me, maybe Fjord, could make that person fall asleep for at least a day.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's what all of us were wearing, dude.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, now we have it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do I say to make them fall asleep?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nothing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't want it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glancing over the chains, you can only begin to fathom how many people have been put in that set.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't want it at all.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I pocket it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's pretty big.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a set of manacles. It's like two wrist manacles--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How big is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's maybe about 15, 20 pounds of metal.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (southern accent) I was thinking oversized handcuffs, but nevermind.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (southern accent) That can go in the bag of holding for sure. Or the bottomless bag.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You got that. You can have this, this is a gem that can summon a creature of fire.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A creature of fire?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. That is amazing. That is powerful.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, I feel like fire is kind of your thing. You sure you want me to have this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's not my thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It kind of is your thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not me and me alone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's going to be a lot of overlap.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. I'll hold on to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys all resting up for the evening? As the sun is right about now, Caleb, rising. It's about 5:30 in the morning.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it? Ooh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys have been doing all this through the night.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we taking a long rest?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Sleep until the afternoon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Before I turn in, can I sit with Molly's sword?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Staring at it. Thank you, you were very kind to me. I hope to do right by you and make it up to you one day. And I'll try to concentrate on the sword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're looking at the blade and you blink and as your eyes open, that shadowed depths are around you once more. You look around for an instant and all you see is the deep, dark recesses of some endless ocean. You look down at the blade in your grasp, the Summer's Dance blade, and then blink once more and you're back in the chamber and it's gone from your hand.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The blade's gone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like totally.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys watched as he focused on it over time, the blade seemed to fade away. It looks like the exterior begins to turn to ash and crumble, but then nothing hits the ground below it. Then it's gone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We all saw this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All those who were paying attention and hadn't gone to sleep yet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where does all this stuff inside of you go? You have so much extra storage space in you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'm kind of like this bag of holding, huh?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. I don't know. I want to keep Molly with us, though. With me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know what you mean.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that awkward silence, you see Keg staring straight out, the guilt on the face of the mention of Molly once more. "I'm going to have to-- I'm just going to leave you guys to rest. I'm "going to take some me time." Then backs out of the dome and one quick glance at Beau as she exits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I poke my head out and I go: You owe me a night! And I go back in. I pop back in and I go: I'll be back in like an hour and 20 minutes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why don't you make it two hours?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If it's two hours, don't come looking for me. If it's two and a half, then get worried.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're explaining too much.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. Follow Keg.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I look in the haversack? Is my sketchbook still in there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your sketchbook is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Going to get out my sketchbook and I'm going to leave the little bubble for a little bit and wander out and I see Beau and Keg. I wander a little further away and I sit down with my sketchbook.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You just see blankets. It's like when the Sims.

lines.name: LIAM
