lines.text: (coughing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bartender's already refilled yours.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (hoarsely) Is it supposed to do that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yes, very much. The earth is calling you to her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (groaning and coughing) (hoarsely) Do you have anything to take the edge off?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Try some milk. That always helps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He pours another glass of milk and pushes it forward.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A milk chaser for your whiskeys?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, this is what people drink?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (stage whisper) Someone give him a white russian! (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How did we not go there first! Oh my god.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If you like milk, you'll love this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You got any Kahlua back there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're the worst people!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ever had a Cement Mixer?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I find-- is it Kara?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kara. She's at the back, waiting. She's watching you as you approach.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We were gone for a while. When we left, Zadash was in a it of a tizzy. How is it in the city?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's apparently all right. Most of the business has made its way eastward. Things have gone back to normal."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Troop presence about the same?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, most of the troop presence made its way out towards where the outposts were."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Any coming back? Any wounded, any--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not that I've been paying attention to at least."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No incursions, no security problems?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not right now."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course. Come back and ask tomorrow, it might change, but-- Hey. Glad you're well."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You all right there, bud?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't think I take compliments very well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, you don't.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Whiskey!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The drinks are served around, you guys can take as much time here as you'd like to. Whatever you'd like to do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can leave, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, whatever you want. You can do whatever you want to do. The city is yours.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to plonk down in front of Fjord, just for a minute, after everybody's milling about for a while.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to sit down as well. Sit in a little booth in the back corner. Back corner boothin'.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Raise a glass, you two assholes. Here is to fucking making it work.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You got out of that without any liquor on you. Real impressive.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it was honestly-- this is why I don't wear white.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cheers.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Congratulations on being alive.

lines.name: TRAVIS, LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fjord, you survived being chained up and tortured. That's got to fuck with a person, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it-- More the disappointment. I expect better of myself. Let you guys down, I let Jester down, I let Yasha down. I'll never be able to shake this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fjord, you cannot keep blaming yourself when you were the victim in this circumstance. You understand that, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I don't.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There are people to blame. I wasn't joking when I said it was someone's fault earlier, but it is not yours. The only person whose fucking fault it was is that fucking asshole Lorenzo's and fucking human traffickers.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I get that. I do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You cannot blame yourself when you are taken advantage of. You know what I mean?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't understand, though. My whole life was trying to blend in, trying to keep an eye out for someone that was looking to take advantage, that was going to exploit. I got comfortable. I felt relaxed. There's no reason why the three of us out on watch couldn't see them coming out and raise an alarm fast enough.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's also no reason that the three of us couldn't have made a fucking plan that couldn't have gotten Molly killed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll drink to that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, and we're never going to forget it. It's going to ride with us until we're dead.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. It puts everything in perspective, though, I'll tell you that much.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, those things don't go away. You carry that shit with you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was floating around, trying to find my way to the Cerberus. I don't know if that's what I want to do anymore.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do you want to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I felt like I almost died and I hadn't taken care of any of the shit that got me here in the first place. I was so worried about trying to learn about these new abilities that-- I felt like I got distracted. I have people I want to find and things I want to remedy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. How did Jester do? No offense, but she seems like she's a little bit more willfully stronger than you are.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like, she came out of there like a little kettle of popcorn, just no problem. I mean-- Can I see Jester? Is she nearby?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester, are you nearby?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just Sixteen Candles-ing it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was worried. There were really dark times. I would hear Jester singing to herself at night and then she'd change lyrics, and then my name would be in the lyrics sometimes. Every morning, she would try and cheer everybody up that was around her, but she had the muffle? So I couldn't tell if my brain was playing tricks on me, or if she was just-- I don't think there's much that gets her down. It's kind of inspiring.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think it is an act.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: An act?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think it is an act.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It is kind of fucked that there's no music right now, and she's just--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Can't force the playlist.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, she has a lot of-- she's an amazing woman, but talent is different than happiness, I guess.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know, she looks fucking stoked to me right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, she's very drunk.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nuh-uh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to join this table. I've had six drinks. I'm in the biggest city I've ever been in. Everything tastes terrible! I don't even know what these last two are; they're just terrible!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You don't drink it because it tastes good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mr. Clay, have a seat. Drop a deuce.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Eyy!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was well placed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If it had to be anywhere.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's making fun of your name!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah, no, I've heard it before.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, it's well-natured, though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of course!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You've heard it before? Did you have a lot of cemetery folks that were good for good-natured ribbing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You'd be amazed at how people deal with a grieving process. I mean, you're going through it right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go: (yelling) Jester! Nott!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (yelling) Come sit down! Damn it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay! Have you not thrown up yet?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is that part of-- are you supposed to?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You will.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How's your face feel?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Normal face style, I suppose.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go like this, go: (trills)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (trills)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you feel it? Can you feel that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can feel my lips doing that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's pretty tall. He's a big guy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a lot of weight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can't properly be part of civilization until you've gotten shit-faced and thrown up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh! You know what you're going to be good for when it's cold? Fucking hot toddies.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (gasps)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've made a hot toddy before.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I bet you make a great hot toddy. Out of some dead folks' feet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, man.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Cinnamon lemon tea.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bit of a little side conversation. I slap down the rest of my Goldschläger.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Eww! God!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your Hpnotiq? Your Malibu?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. You, have some more. You will dance better, ja. You have just survived death!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't need any help to dance better! I dance pretty good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I understand that, but we are dancing along the razor's edge of death, so, you know, I feel like you should embrace the morbidity of life.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You don't have to drink it--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You definitely do not have to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, you don't have to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Definitely don't have to.

lines.name: MARISHA, LIAM
lines.text: Not at all.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like this is reverse psychology.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't drink it, whatever you do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know what I'm supposed to do now!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You are supposed to not drink that--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Have you ever had liquor?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, of course.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. Well, what happened?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well. I mean I had like--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we talking when you were a little girl with the--?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There you go. Nothing happens!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think-- no, she's never drunk.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't think so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why not?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know, milk is just so good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It is very good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know if I agree with that, but--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there a reason why you won't drink? Are you afraid?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Afraid? I'm not afraid of anything!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow, that's intense.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's no reason to be afraid of anything. Nevermind.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Look at these things!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're huge!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you know what, we are all just happy to be alive. It was just the spirit of the moment. I don't mean to pressure you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Should have just ordered that from the first place, something that tastes good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh, Mr. Clay, have you ever had a doughnut?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you ever had any pastries?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I mean, I've made bread, but I don't--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) You know where we should take him?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That one place right next to the smut shop that had the really good doughnuts?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's a smut shop?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) Oh, life is going to unfold in front of you!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's where Molly would want us to go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Molly would want us to go to the bathhouse.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everybody raise a glass.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: (singing) To freedom!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh. To that purple devil. To Mollymauk Tealeaf.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To the Tealeaf.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hear, hear.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Now to our new Tealeaf.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughs) That's funny.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's ironic.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Purely coincidental. Really, purely coincidental.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, definitely the bathhouse and Pumat, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's been like a month. He's got to have some cool shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fjord, you want to go shopping this week, yeah?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure. (sniffs) (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's very drunk. Must be drunk.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What would you like? What kind of swords would you like to eat this week? Would you like to eat like a sai? Like, you know, like Raphael's weapon? Or would you like to have, maybe--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Raphael, the mason?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The tortle!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's a bard from--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You talking about experimenting with how many weapons we can see--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, what could we put into his mouth? This is all out of character, I don't know any of this stuff, but I would like to talk to Travis about swallowing whole, long swords.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I didn't really swallow the last one. It just kind of absorbed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, keep telling yourself that, big guy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So here's my question. If we don't turn in the crystal eyeball--

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: cloven crystal.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fuckable cantaloupe.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If we don't have that, does that mean bounty hunters are going to come after you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jonas. I'm not sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's Ionos.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ionos?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jonos!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a special "I" on there. I can't tell.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: May I have a look at that? Oh, Keen Mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. You have to delete that in 30 days.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, nobody knows about its current origins. We just know who was looking for it and who it was supposed to go to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you notice The Gentleman's face when you mentioned that name?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He looked over at Ophelia. It was very suspicious.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I thought that was just the bone-dogging look.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, you have to pick up on the subtleties of the human expression to get this stuff. Jester and I saw it. It was definitely suspicious.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, he started sweating out of nervousness.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He did! Very good, Caleb! It's a tell, is what it is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should see if he knows the name Evantica.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think I'll go mention it to The Gentleman.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But just say it like--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In passing!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, don't make it obvious. It's a casual sort of name.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is he still in the bar?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's in the bar. He's actually near the stairs. At this point, the two drivers have brought down all the handbags for Ophelia and have placed them in a pile at the base of it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Matching Gucci luggage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. It looks like she's shacking up in the Underworks for a little bit while they re-establish this trade route. So they're in a bit of conversation, flirtatiously. He seems-- it's like a subtle Pepe le Pew scenario, where he's definitely laying it on a bit thick and she's being very dodgy and playful, but, you know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Establishing trade routes."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we see this? Do we see this happening?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see it at a distance, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's totally flirting with him just to get the goods.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You think so?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, yeah! She doesn't actually, like, want this, she just wants to maintain a good relationship.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He is laying it on thick.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep. Look, she's like, "Mmm, please stop touching me."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I will trust you, because you are-- I'm going to quit while I'm ahead.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was a good bail-out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're a good friend. Please don't ever ask me about my sex life.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I say this with the utmost gravity. I have no interest in your sex life. Do you believe me? Insight check me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's an insight check?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I only have gold; I don't have checks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (sighs) You're a good friend.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's get out of this place.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Aren't you going to yell the name out? (shouting) Antigua! Antigua!

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: That's not the name.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's an island.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're going to Florida!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did it work?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I don't think that would do it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Every 50th episode, Critical Role has to have a drunken bar night. It's in a contract somewhere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think it is, yeah. It's in our own internal friend contract.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pub crawl? Pub crawl?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Go, go, go!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to stumble over to The Gentleman, and say: I think we're going to head out now, but if you need us, we'll probably be at The Leaky Tap or something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, that's fine. You know where to find me if you need anything as well."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, sure. We've been summoned by this person named Evantica, so we're probably going to go find--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Well, if there's anything you require from me, let me know."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. You don't know where she is in town?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Can't say I do."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or he? I'm not really sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Cool, cool, cool.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) Can you insight check him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, off we go! Oh, Jester! Don't forget! We're going to talk about the Captain later!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's already talking to Ophelia. He isn't paying attention. He's now having various members of his troupe pick up her bags for her and move her into one of the other chambers.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was insight checking him while Nott was talking to him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this distance, you can't even see his face, unfortunately, so it's hard. You're seeing body movement a little bit, but his gestures seem to be in line with classic Gentleman.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like his hands moved a little bit more, but I can't tell for sure. There was tension! There was tension in his fist. Right here, I saw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. I couldn't focus because there was so much dripping going on. It's a mask of water. It's disgusting.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I kind of like it. I think it looks cool.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How do you make a non-tense fist? I'm trying to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like this. Well, you know--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Keep going! Follow that thread! Pull on that string!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Be like water.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, let's get the fuck out of here!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Super hammered, we stumble out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys stumble your way out of The Evening Nip, back into the streets of Zadash, to find your fortune, to enjoy the fruits of your labor, and, the best way you can, maintain the memory of a man who lived life to its fullest. A man, a woman, a they-- to the fullest.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I light a few cherry bombs and throw them at my friends in celebration.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You have cherry bombs? The fuck those come from?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fireworks are going off in the center of the street. (popping)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: For Molly!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some horses freak out, and some carts get dragged down at a fast pace down the road.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I drunkenly form the Goblight!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! (vocalizing) My whole body starts glowing with the light. You set me on fire!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (shouting) It's all for Molly!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A confusing display follows you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've made a terrible mistake.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Heading towards the Pentamarket. That's where we'll pick up next week.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caduceus Clay! We are your destiny!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh no. This is a lot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll pick up on that next Thursday. You guys will have some downtime! We'll have a couple weeks of game downtime for your characters, if there's anything you want to accomplish.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to do so much!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we tell you now, or later?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Think about it over the next week, and the beginning of the next episode, we'll discuss what it is you want to accomplish, and we might have a few momentary role play moments depending on what it is you want to do. That involves contacts, purchases, research, looking for information, anything you want to do specific to your character. Start thinking about that throughout the week.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Money-wise, we each get 964 more gold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we make that platinum? Because most of that is platinum. What would that be?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 964 each.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's 96 platinum and four gold.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, man, that's great. All my spell books and scrolls will be converted in the next week! Huzzah! Are you sure we can't play for another seven hours tonight? Just this once? Just one ten-hour Critical Role episode?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you remember that tavern called The Leaky Nip?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow. Have you been sitting on that all night? Because that was amazing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If I didn't have a 9:00am call time in Santa Monica tomorrow, I would be totally down for it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So you're saying there's a chance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [music]
